name: Grand Mini Sokoban
description:
Mini Sokoban inspired game where you push boxes to fill all of the spots in the map before the time runs out and each time you run out of time you  lose a grand! and won't progress to the next level. Every time you progress you gain a grand of coins. If you make a mistake and choose to reset the level you lose 250 points. Try your best to finish all levels on time with highest score.

Game - short and sweet
